projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h5.Description

When the CLI logs that an application has launched for Android device/emulator and iOS device the CLI logs {{Start application log}} however when launching an iOS simulator the CLI logs {{Start simulator log}}, these messages should be consistent.

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Build a titanium app for an iOS sim
2. Build a titanium app for an Android emulator

h5.Actual Result

The messages are different

h5.Expected Result

The messages should be the same
fields.summary: CLI: Use a consistent message for logging when an application log has started
fields.environment:
Appc CLI (NPM): 4.0.0
Appc CLI (Registry): 4.0.1
Titanium SDK: 4.0.0.GA
